newsitem.title: BAHRAIN: PRESS DIGEST - Saudi newspapers - May 25.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Saudi newspapers - May 25.

text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the Saudi Arabian press on Sunday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Khatami scores upset win in Iran's presidential election.
- The Saudi Industrial Services Company plans to build first private water desalination plant in Saudi.
- Makkah Construction Company sells a villa for 25.9 million riyals, one of six villas offered in an auction.
- King Fahd congratulates newly elected Iranian president.
- Saudi Arabia to undertake water projects in Qassim at a cost of 380 million riyals.
- Saudi extended assistance worth $598 million to the World Food Programme since it was established.
- Saudi announces the discovery of two new oil and gas fields in the eastern and central provinces.
